validityText:

In this case, the input contains three sentences: "Covid-19 has impacted the global economy significantly.", "Many businesses had to adapt to new ways of operating." and "Remote work became the new normal." Each sentence is clearly delineated by a period and expresses a complete thought, which aligns with the standard understanding of what constitutes a sentence. Therefore, the input meets the requirement of containing at least three sentences, satisfying the specification.

OK
